sourceDesc.p: This is a born digital document

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the project "WIBARAB". This project is an ERC funded project.

revisionDesc.change: set up templates for WIBARAB paratexts

div.head: 20.02.2024: WIBARAB prototype is online!
div.p: As of today, the first prototype of the WIBARAB application is published providing a preview to the data and functionalities developed by the project. The implementation is based on a completely rewrite of the VICAV frontend which was developed in parallel to the WIBARAB application. Here you can find a description o the project.
